Uses of Package
lps.pr2

Packages that use lps.pr2
lps.pr2   
lps.pr2.commands   
 

Classes in lps.pr2 used by lps.pr2
Game
          This class is responsible for controlling the main loop of the interactive adventure.
Inventory
          An inventory stores the items the player picks during the game.
Item
          This class represents the items that can appear in the rooms.
Parser
          Parser is in charge of parsing a inputstream in order to create a valid command.
Parser.Direction
          Enumeration that represents the cardinal directions: North, east, south and west.
Room
          This class represents a room in the adventure game.

Game
          This class is responsible for controlling the main loop of the interactive adventure.
Inventory

Parser
          Parser is in charge of parsing a inputstream in order to create a valid command.
